ygData.subject: Re: Call for help! Spoiler and Spoiler Request
ygData.msgSnippet: Choon is the higher level, I cant solo broon with my 25 bard, but I can with my 29 Wizard. Jaezebel Moonsong Gypsy Bard of the 25 Song Spirit of the Moon
ygData.messageBody:
Choon is the higher level, I cant solo broon with my 25 bard, but I can with
my 29 Wizard.

Jaezebel Moonsong
Gypsy Bard of the 25 Song
Spirit of the Moon
Innoruuk

Zinncarla D'Loncrae
Wizardress of the 29th circle
-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 11:13 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Call for help! Spoiler and Spoiler Request


>From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
>
>I can add that Greater Darkbones can be found in Unrest and upper 20's in
>lvl. I would also question Choon and Broon both being 30th lvl. I know
one
>of them is a good several lvls above the other, but I forget which.
>
>Laena - 23 E'ci
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: roleplay@... [mailto:roleplay@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 11:04 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Call for help! Spoiler and Spoiler Request

>From: <roleplay@...>

>Ok. I am compiling the information for the Lambent Armor Quest (that we
know
>of as of now).
>
>I have found the location and levels for most of the mobs. I will paste
what
>I have below. If any of
>my information is wrong then please let me know either through personal
>email or the list. Also any
>help in filling in the blanks would be appreciated as well.
>
>Thanks
>Ranian Aeleroth
>

>Spoiler info:
>1. Lambent Gauntlets
>Shin Gauntlets from a Froglok Shin Knight (Lower Guk; 35)
>Black Silk Gloves from a Deathly Usher (Castle Mistmoore. ; Level 30'ish)
>Lambent Star Ruby
>
>2. Lambent Greaves
>Icy Greaves from an Elite Goblin Guard (Permafrost; Level 25; Room is
tough)
>Shin Greaves from a Shin Ghoul Knight (Lower Guk; Level ?)
>Lambent Fire Opal
>
>3. Lambent Boots
>Firewalker Boots from a Solusek Mage (Solusek A, level 25'ish)
>Middle portion of the Rune of the One Eye from Froon (West Karana; Level
30)
>Lambent Sapphire
>
>4. Lambent Helm
>Opoline Helm from a Deepwater Goblin (Dagnor's Cauldron?; Level 30'ish)
>Mudwater Rune from a Lizard Fanatic (Cazic Thule; Level 30)
>Lambent Star Ruby.
>
>5. Lambent Breastplate
>Basalt Carapace from a Basalt Gargoyle (Lower Guk; level ?)
>Gypsy Lute from ? (Castle Mistmoore; Level ?)
>Lambent Ruby
>
>6. Lambent Vambraces
>Fiery Vambraces from a Solusek Champion (Solusek ; Level 25-30)
>The top portion of the Rune of the One Eye from Choon (West Karana; Level
>30)
>Lambent Sapphire
>
>7. Lambent Bracers
>Dark Boned Bracelet from a Greater Dark Boned Skeleton (?; Level ?)
>Griffenne Charm from a Griffenne (Karana's; Level 25-30)
>Lambent Fire Opal
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with
